GameItemType.Description: This bow in enchanted to pull with ease, allowing even an amateur to fire it quickly. Accuracy falls upon the user's skill as marksman.
This bow fires its arrows with enhanced accuracy.
Mystantum is extremely difficult to bend, making greaves and cuirass the only options for this lightweight, ironless material.
A breastplate made from magically hardened mystantum. Though inferior to iron armor, it requires no metal to forge.
Though difficult to give a lasting edge, these blades are swift and deadly once sharpened.
Mystantum isn't as sturdy as iron, but this shield is easy to lift and can still deflect lethal blows.

GameModifier.Provides: Shield Bash- Knocks the victim back a tile

GameItemType.Description: A master armorer's lifetime achievement. Those within resist flame.
A master armorer's lifetime achievement. The wearer will resist the damaging effects of electrical currents.
A master armorer's lifetime achievement. They magically resist the effects of cold.
A master armorer's lifetime achievement. Those within are much harder to kill, even if the armor itself is somehow bypassed.
A master armorer's lifetime achievement. It prevents enemies from overwhelming its bearer, muddling their attempts to concentrate force.

GameModifier.Provides: Shield Bash- Knocks the victim back a tile

GameItemType.Description: A master armorer's lifetime achievement. They powerfully repel magic.
Thick gloves are suggested for those that wield this staff.
A jet of fire can be coaxed from the embers that eternally burn on the tip of this staff.
Also known as the dragon's breath staff. A torrent of fire can be coaxed out of the flames that continually burn at the staff's tip.
Much like Queen Procipinee herself, this staff's beauty is a mask for the power it contains.
Enchanters sell these staves in the Lombard Desert - not because they are powerful weapons, but because they keep the wielder cool.
Drinking this slosh of toad's venom mixed with herbs is a sure way to vomit. But force your soldiers to imbibe and their resistance to poisons will slightly increase.
Even its incredibly sharp blade cannot explain the boundless terror this weapon instills in those who face it.

GameModifier.Provides: Victims lose their next turn unless they resist.

GameItemType.Description: The tips of these pikes care little for armor.

GameModifier.Provides: +3 Attack vs mounted opponents (when not mounted)
Impale- Strike an opponent and whoever is behind them

GameItemType.Description: Fire an arrow from this bow, and it will seem to have hit before the string was even pulled.
Even mountains have fear.

GameModifier.Provides: Bash- Has a chance equal to the damage done of knocking the victim prone
Crushing Blow- +50% Attack, but you lose your next action

GameItemType.Description: Even a child could halve an ox with this axe, whose swing is augmented by magic to be inexplicably mighty. Take care which warrior is allowed its use.

GameModifier.Provides: Backswing- If the attack misses the unit gets a second attack against the same target
+75% damage when using the Cleave ability

GameItemType.Description: An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.

GameItemType.Description: An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
Despite the significant weight of these metal boots, its wearer will glide like a gymnast across the battlefield.
An armorer working with mere iron shouldn't be capable of making such an incredible set of armor - but it is yours nonetheless.
Any movement of the body in these greaves becomes easy to repeat and refine.
Its layers of protection not only protect the brain, but enhance its focus.
The hands in these stout gauntlets become much more lethal.
Any who stand behind this shield will endure where mere mortals would fall broken.

GameModifier.Provides: Shield Bash- Knocks the victim back a tile

GameItemType.Description: The height of non-magical craftsmanship, this sword is perfectly forged for balance, weight, and cutting power.
A perfectly forged head-removing device requiring no enchantment.

GameModifier.Provides: Backswing- If the attack misses the unit gets a second attack against the same target

GameItemType.Description: An imposing piercing weapon of the highest quality.

GameModifier.Provides: +3 Attack vs mounted opponents (when not mounted)
Impale- Strike an opponent and whoever is behind them

GameItemType.Description: This bow draws with incredible ease, and launches arrows with deadly precision, all without enchantment.
If you can lift it, swinging it will deal damage no mere mortal could survive.

GameModifier.Provides: Bash- Has a chance equal to the damage done of knocking the victim prone
Crushing Blow- +25% Attack (+100% for champions), but you lose your next action

GameItemType.Description: Use this scroll to do 8 cold damage (+1 per water shard) per member to enemy units.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to cast Frost Storm, which does cold damage to all units within a 2 tile radius

GameItemType.Description: This sword is a re-creation the smithing of the Titans, a weapon of material so mighty only the Forge of The Overlord could have wrought it.
The rage of a thundercloud hides inside its metal, only freed by the wrath of the wielder.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit counts as wielding a sword

GameItemType.Description: Holding this tiny charm brings out the pack hunter in anyone.

GameModifier.Provides: This unit recieves triple the normal Swarm bonus

GameItemType.Description: This champion can equip armor one level higher than their abilities would otherwise allow.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to wear armor of one higher level(none allows chain, chain allows plate)

GameItemType.Description: This blade hums with a mysterious vibration, ready to exude deadly rays of light upon its bearer's command.

GameModifier.Provides: Allow this unit to cast Brilliance
Unit counts as wielding a sword

GameItemType.Description: This axe is ever throbbing with the essence of death itself.

GameModifier.Provides: Those struck by this weapon must resist a spell or be instantly killed.
Backswing- If the attack misses the unit gets a second attack against the same target

GameItemType.Description: This incredble weapon can send out a wave of incredible force with its strike, ripping apart entire armies.

GameModifier.Provides: Overpower- Damage is multiplied by the number of units in the enemies group
Impale- Strike an opponent and whoever is behind them

GameItemType.Description: Whosoever fires these arrows, shall deliver the wrath of all righteous storms.
Woe to he who stands where these arrows land, for the earth shall become fire and all flesh shall burn away. Take care you do not catch yourself in its blast!
The power of this weapon is enough to crush any mortal man. But a creature mighty enough to survive of its blows will find their legs bound magically, and pain overcoming them from unseen malice.

GameModifier.Provides: Units struck aew imprisoned for 5 turns
Bash- Has a chance equal to the damage done of knocking the victim prone
Crushing Blow- Attack with +50% power but lose your next turn

GameItemType.Description: Upon gripping its handle, and a rhythmic cadence takes up the user's body, moving them with effortless grace, and dropping their sword arm with a lethal elegance. Opponenents, on the other hand, appear to the wielder as if awkward cripples.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit counts as wielding a sword
Tarantella Step - cut through a line of enemies

GameItemType.Description: As mighty as this weapon's strike proves, its true power is in always standng ready to summon an army of dead warriors, returned to stand at the wielder's side.

GameModifier.Provides: Bash- Has a chance equal to the damage done of knocking the victim prone
Crushing Blow- Attack at +50% attack, but lose your next turn

GameItemType.Description: This jeweled insect makes the wearer difficult to strike, especially from afar.

This ring was enchanted for indispensible generals who rode into combat at the head of the ranks, to protect from swift death by errant missle or a single axe swipe - but it is still no substitute for a full set of armor.
Bearing this ring, even a boy who has never gripped a sword shall strike true.

Seemingly useless to many who have worn it, is magic only awakens when the bearer already carries an enchantment of flame. Those carrying spells of fire will see that their flame strikes with enchanced ferocity.
This glyph was given no form by its designer, but itself took one fitting to its enchanted purpose - to make its bearer more lethal.

GameModifier.Provides: +25% damage when using the Impale ability
+25% damage when using the Crushing Blow ability
+25% damage when using the Cleave ability

GameItemType.Description: Those wearing this glyph can push at enemies from afar with unseen force.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to cast Push

GameItemType.Description: This cloak augments the movement of the wearer to avoid arrows, bolts, or missiles - but provides no such boon against swinging hammers!
When donned, this cloak provides general protection from elemental attacks - but not nearly enough to be truly safe.
When donned, this cloak helps to mitigate harmful spells.
These gauntlets imbue the wearer with the power of the stars.
No one bearing this armor will fear death.
To harm the one wearing this armor is to die.

GameModifier.Provides: Reflects 100% of the damage back at the attacker

GameItemType.Description: Any who strike the wearer of this headpiece shall be stunned in punishment.

GameModifier.Provides: Attacking this unit causes the attacker to lose their next attack unless they resist.

GameItemType.Description: This bone charm increases the wearer's heal rate.
